description:
Lightning Talks 2017-05-20 Evening

+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ Start    | Speakers           | Subject                                                +
+==========+====================+========================================================+
+ 0:30     | Meredydd Luff      | **Compiling blocking Python to non-blocking JS**       +
+          |                    | - Wrote client side JS in Python before yield or await +
+          |                    | statements, using Skulpt transpiler.                   +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 5:45     | Efron Licht        | **Elements of Style**                                  +
+          |                    | - Write understandle code; write a story. Shorter      +
+          |                    | functions.                                             +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 11:45    | Maria Mckinley     | **Refactoring Lengthy Bits of Code**                   +
+          |                    | - Towards understanding the steps to refactoring: a    +
+          |                    | test, prose, outline, make functions and tests.        +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 15:45    | Erik Rose          | **Getting Things Unguilty**                            +
+          |                    | - Using "getting things done" as a one slide           +
+          |                    | flowchart.                                             +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 21:45    | Meggie Mahnken     | **Using _slots_ for More Opinionated Objects**         +
+          |                    | - __slots__ when you don't want to allow attributes;   +
+          |                    | sometimes efficient.                                   +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 26:00    | Travis             | **Crowd Computing**                                    +
+          |                    | - fun controlling crowds with Python                   +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 29:15    | Allen Downey       | **Physical Modeling in Python**                        +
+          |                    | - Making an interactive book for undergrad engineer to +
+          |                    | improve experience by putting in real world early.     +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 33:00    | Luceneo            | **Time is Money**                                      +
+          |                    | - Professor Antonio Candido gives an alternative view  +
+          |                    | to this aphorism.                                      +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 35:45    | Cynthia Lynn       | **PyCon, a High Schooler's Perspective**               +
+          |                    | - A 15 year-old programmer.  Didn't come for a job;    +
+          |                    | felt accepted and welcome.                             +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 41:45    | David Bieber       | **Python Fire, comand line interfaces**                +
+          |                    | - Single lines or decorators added to functions or     +
+          |                    | classes to make CLIs; great workflow                   +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
+ 47:15    |                    | **Pitches for different conferences**                  +
+          |                    | - One minute each for Python conferences around the    +
+          |                    | world.                                                 +
+----------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+
title: Lightning talks May 20th, 2017 Evening session session
